article_title: If Libertarian Rand Paul Was President, Here's What the U.S. Economy Would Look Like
article_text:
Cramer Skeptical of Dauman's Future Despite Lawsuit

Viacom CEO Philippe Dauman filed a legal complain to remain a part of the Redstone Trust after the aging media mogul was said to remove him on Friday.

article_metadata.description: Rand Paul as president would eviscerate the Fed, close the Commerce department, the EPA, institute a flat tax rate and allow corporations to self-regulate. In short, a lot of changes.
article_metadata.author: Leon Lazaroff
